item.title: Violent Streak
item.description: __ I am an fairly (extremely) emotional person. A lot of my life till now, most of it, has been driven by strong emotional decisions. All the my successes, even more failures, friendships and more have had a heavy dose of emotion involved. I love it when good music makes me cry, I constant want to hug my friends, I even quit my job once weeks before a promotion.
